A '''Nympher''' was a female pickpocket who distracted an intended victim with her womanly charms. The term also referred to women who worked with other pickpockets to provide distractions. They were commonplace in [[Luskan]] and also known to operate in [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite digital book/Shadowbane|2008}}
{{stub}}
